Posts.Content: Hi Gummybear, I have been getting herceptin injections and this afternoon is my second last one,due to finish April 20th. I have been ok so far,tired and weight gain has been my issues but not sure if it’s herceptin alone or due to the chemo and radiotherapy,I’m also on tamoxifen. I’ve developed high blood pressure but it seems to be getting better. It’s just a hell of a rollercoaster. Have a nice Easter weekend xx
Posts.Title: starting herceptin
